name: Algebra.TensorProduct.quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot_mk
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
B : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommRing A
inst✝¹ : CommRing B
inst✝ : Algebra A B
I : Ideal A
b : B
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot B I) ((Ideal.Quotient.mk (Ideal.map (algebraMap A B) I)) b)) (TensorProduct.tmul A b 1)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot_mk (b : B) :
    quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot B I b = b ⊗ₜ[A] 1 :=
  rfl

name: Algebra.TensorProduct.quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot_symm_tmul
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
B : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommRing A
inst✝¹ : CommRing B
inst✝ : Algebra A B
I : Ideal A
b : B
a : A
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot B I).symm (TensorProduct.tmul A b ((Ideal.Quotient.mk I) a))) (Submodule.Quotient.mk (HSMul.hSMul a b))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot_symm_tmul (b : B) (a : A) :
    (quotIdealMapEquivTensorQuot B I).symm (b ⊗ₜ[A] a) = Submodule.Quotient.mk (a • b) :=
  rfl
